Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & GLEN ANTIPAS
Situated moments away from the Derrimut Village, parks, schools and transport this meticulously looked after home is your entry ticket into the popular estate of Brimbank Gardens. Comprising of three bedrooms, master with ensuite, formal lounge room, well-equipped kitchen with adjoining meals area and open plan family room that leads out to your low-maintenance landscaped rear garden. Other features include heating and cooling, alarm system and double garage with remote.

Description:
FIVE BEDROOMS - 650SQM APPROX LAND
On a massive allotment of approximately 650sqm this property presents an affordable and potential filled opportunity in the booming Derrimut market. With five (5) spacious bedrooms, the master with walk through robe to ensuite and 4 additional bedrooms of good size serviced by the lovely central bathroom, this home can comfortably accommodate the largest of families. Alternatively buyers that prefer additional living space can easily convert a bedroom of choice into any type of living zone they prefer be it a formal lounge , rumpus or theatre room. The open plan kitchen overlooks the dining and main living area and leads out to the huge alfresco with bonus kitchenette featuring cooktop and sink. The monstrous rear yard awaits your imagination and opens up a multitude of options, keeping it simple with heaps of space for the kids to run around and play , creating an amazing outdoor space to entertain family or friends or add a pool and enjoy years of resort style living. Another huge feature of the property is the possible side access to another large space on the eastern side of the home that is discreetly hidden from the main rear yard that would be perfect for a huge shed or secure parking and storage for a boat, caravan or any other toys you may have. Other features include ducted heating, video intercom, double remote garage with internal access and the convenience of being located walking distance to all the suburbs amenities.

Description:
An Example Of Style, Space & Quality
Immaculately presented and extremely well looked after, this single level sensation will suit the young or growing family looking for the perfect home. Situated in a popular pocket of Derrimut with schools, parks, sporting facilities, Sunshine golf club, Ballarat Road shopping strip, easy freeway access and the Derrimut village just around the corner, this home offers something for the parents and children.
Comprising of 4 large bedrooms with BIRs, master with full ensuite and WIR, home office/nursery, formal lounge with chandelier, large modern kitchen fitted with Blanco stainless steel appliances and an island bench with bar seating room, overlooking the adjoining meals area and open plan living room, separate rumpus/theatre room, spacious laundry with storage space, modern central bathroom and a large outdoor under cover entertainment area with landscaped gardens.
Features: Feature walls, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roller blinds, downlights, granite benchtop, Blanco stainless steel appliances, chandelier, walk in pantry x 2, double remote garage with internal/external access and French doors.
Insights: 34 Pembroke Crescent, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Presenting like brand new this magnificent Metricon residence is an absolute credit to its current owners. The home comprises 3 spacious bedrooms , master with WIR and double vanity, oversize shower ensuite and a huge open plan kitchen featuring glass splashback, 900mm stainless steel appliances and dishwasher that overlooks the dining and expansive main living area that flows out to the alfresco creating that indoor /outdoor living we all love. Other features include kids retreat or second living space, lovely contemporary flooring, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, designer lighting, solar panel system ( no electricity bills ) , double remote garage and beautiful low maintenance gardens including extensive concreting and artificial grass and a fantastic cubby house the kids will love. A special home awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
Family Paradise
Proudly presenting this gorgeous contemporary family home with no stone left unturned, you can rest assure all the hard work has been completed. Boasting a flexible floorplan for every buyer with four oversized fitted bedrooms, master with large walk in robe and full ensuite, stunning formal lounge leading through to an open plan family meals arrangement. Executive appointments include a modern hostess kitchen with abundance of cupboard space, quality timber bench tops, stainless steel appliances, large pantry, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, outstanding pergola, double car accommodation with internal access and low maintenance gardens.
This prestige home presents stunning and is a only stone's throw away from all local amenities, positioned amongst house proud owners in the sought after Brimbank Gardens Estate.
Avoid further disappointment as inspections are our pleasure!

Description:
Porter Davis- 4 Bedrooms Plus Study
Combining cutting-edge design and high quality fittings, this 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home will take your breath away. Set in an established pocket, this absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family Luxury living in one of Derrimut's finest locations. The interior is instantly eye-catching with its wide entrance flowing throughout the ground level.
The gourmet kitchen highlights the home's luxury and detail with caesarstone bench tops, ample cupboard storage, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooker, splashback and a walk-in pantry.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms, master with large ensuite and a separate study. The Dining area and adjoining spacious family room make entertaining a breeze. Enjoy your favourite movies in your own Rumpus/theatre room, or entertain family and friends outside with the alfresco area. Upstairs there is a great-sized secondary lounge room which is ideal for a childrens retreat. Other features include, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, internal access from the double garage, plantation shutters, beautiful landscaped front and rear gardens.
The home is ideally located in the heart of Derrimut and within close proximity to Park, schools, transport, freeway and a choice of shopping precincts. Nothing could be finer.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Home Sweet Home
Affordable real-estate is the talk of the town, so here is a tremendous opportunity for a first home buyer or someone wishing to utilize as an investment property.
Situated in a quiet residential street within walking distance to parks, primary schools and public transport and just a short drive to the M8 Freeway, shopping centres and Deer Park Train Station! This youthful well maintained four bedroom brick veneer home features master with walk in robe and ensuite and provides excellent wardrobe space to the remaining bedrooms.
Open plan kitchen and dining area fitted with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and stone bench tops. Separate formal lounge room. Gas ducted heating, split system cooling, intercom, double lock up remote control garage with internal access, landscaped gardens and much more!
With generous storage options throughout the home, neutral colour palette and set in a quiet family orientated location this property is a must see.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
A life of pure indulgence and absolute luxury awaits the new purchaser of this premier Derrimut residence. Upon entering you will be mesmerised by the gorgeous flooring and soaring high ceilings and immediately impressed with those special little touches and upgrades that are prevalent throughout the property. A magnificent open plan kitchen overlooks the expansive dining, main living and rumpus room that flow outside to the grand alfresco with bi-fold door allowing the outside in. Sleeping quarters comprise beautiful master bedroom with twin vanity , oversize shower ensuite and huge WIR , another 3 great sized bedrooms serviced by another high quality bathroom, with the bedroom at the rear having a bonus bi-fold door with access to the alfresco making it the perfect guest room. Other features include separate lounge at the front of the residence, heating , cooling , alarm , downlights, quality window furnishings, custom high doors, an abundance of storage including walk in linen closet and walk in pantry , stone benches in kitchen and bathrooms , low maintenance gardens featuring extensive exposed aggregate concreting and synthetic grass , double remote garage with internal access and double driveway accommodating off street parking for 4 vehicles and so much more. For those that enjoy the finer things in life, the time has come to spoil yourself.

Description:
Live Large
This immaculately designed property offers more than just the essentials.
Enjoy the benefits of large separate living rooms, a spacious open plan kitchen/dining area in a cleverly designed floor plan.
Two separate living areas plus a rumpus rooms means that there’s plenty of space for entertaining guests both indoors and outdoors.
A beautiful master bedroom with a walk in wardrobe and en-suite including two side by side basins for a luxurious and comfortable bathroom.
The house also offers 3 more bedrooms for family/guests, main bathroom, a large outdoor landscaped and sits on a large block.
Located close to schools, parks, shops and with easy access to public transport, don’t miss the rare opportunity to invest or move into this enormous family home!

The home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms with three having walk in robes, the lavish master with WIR and ensuite, upgraded kitchen with thick stone benches, glass splashback, 900mm appliances and huge walk in pantry that overlooks the dining and main living area. Other features include, formal lounge/rumpus room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, gorgeous flooring, landscaped front and rear gardens with extensive decking, double remote garage and so much more. For those that like the finer things in life, the ultimate package in family living and entertaining is there for the taking

Description:
One of a Kind
Once in a while the ultimate in family living comes on the market. Luxurious in every sense this young, masterfully crafted home exudes quality and upgrades that will make you the envy of family and friends. This 51 square family home has no less than three cleverly designed living zones and create the much sought after requirements of modern living. Upstairs occupies 3 of the biggest bedrooms you will ever see and the theatre room with 105 inch home cinema that leads to the balcony is a sanctuary in itself; the sensational Master bedroom is nearly as big a single level house in itself with a dressing room and ensuite.
Downstairs the expansive, flowing floor plan begins with a large bedroom and shower facilities. Enter the hub of the home which takes you to the exquisite kitchen with its quality appliances, stone bench tops, and WIP, family and dining areas (which leads out to the alfresco) round out this impressive living zone. Other notable features include Soaring High Ceilings, 3 Ensuites (4 bathrooms) and 5 toilets, ducted heating system, evaporative cooling system, alarm system, extra-large garage with internal and rear drive through access. This home is close to parks, primary schools and public transport and just a short drive to the Western Ring Road, shopping centres and Deer Park Train Station.
For those that like the finer things in life, the ultimate package in family living and entertaining is there for the taking.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
